actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the condemnation of the Congress with respect to the killings of Israeli children by Palestinian guerrillas on May 15 in Maalot, Israel.

summary.text: Expresses the condemnation of the Congress with respect to the killing of Israeli children by Palestinian guerrillas on May 15 in Maalot, Israel.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the condemnation of the Congress with respect to the killings of Israeli children by Palestinian guerrillas on May 15 in Maalot, Israel.
